sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="New Hire Onboarding Form">a98a013713d68700cb92b7a66144b015</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f5d2382a1336cb00cb92b7a66144b06f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>UserAutoPopulate_onLoad</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
}
function globalAutopopulate() {

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var ga = new GlideAjax('TrimedxOnboardingClient');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getUser');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_id',g_form.getValue('OB_UI_requested_for'));
	ga.getXMLAnswer(function(answer) {
		myObj = JSON.parse(answer);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_FN', myObj.fName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_LN', myObj.lName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PN', myObj.perferredName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PWLA', myObj.location);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_TE', myObj.title);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_CC', myObj.department);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_SR', myObj.manager);
	});
	
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-05 22:10:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>40b6f5ae13f6cb00cb92b7a66144b078</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserAutoPopulate_onLoad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_40b6f5ae13f6cb00cb92b7a66144b078</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 01:02:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
      return;
   }
   
	if(newValue != oldValue) 
	{
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_FN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_LN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PWLA', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_TE', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_CC', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_SR', '');
	}   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-08 00:38:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9b8be85713764f00cb92b7a66144b0cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clear User Fields if requested for chang</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9b8be85713764f00cb92b7a66144b0cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 00:56:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_93ab370213368b00d80074c66144b033
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TrimedxOnboarding</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>onboarding.software.default.group</description><name>TrimedxOnboarding</name><script><![CDATA[var TrimedxOnboarding = Class.create();
TrimedxOnboarding.prototype = {
	createSoftwareTasks: function(arrSoftware, additionalSoftware) {
		for (var x=0; x<arrSoftware.length; x++) {
			var cmdbRel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
			cmdbRel.get(arrSoftware[x]);
			this._createSctask(cmdbRel.child);
		}
		for (var i=0; i<additionalSoftware.length; i++) {
			var cmdbCI = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
			cmdbCI.get(additionalSoftware[i]);
			this._createSctask(cmdbCI);
		}
    },
	_createSctask: function(cmdbCi) {
		var strGroup = cmdbCi.support_group.sys_id;
		if (strGroup == '' || strGroup == undefined ) {
            strGroup = gs.getProperty('onboarding.software.default.group');
        }
		scTask = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
		scTask.initialize();
		scTask.assignment_group = strGroup;
		if(cmdbCi == '224399c4dd9a2400a7e1d1303d19952b' || cmdbCi == 'c33e202519eca5001e13ca3d1230c619' ||cmdbCi == 'b96d71094f083e40369ffd511310c7a4')//concur, RSQ, coupa
			{
				scTask.assignment_group = '97faaad020cc810078f224a318288879 ';//user provisioning
			}
		if(cmdbCi =='d3ad71094f083e40369ffd511310c7d5') //BI360
			{
				scTask.assignment_group = 'f317f89413650b40d80074c66144b0cf ';//Capital Planning
			}
		scTask.short_description = "Onboarding software: " + cmdbCi.getDisplayValue();
		scTask.request_item = current.sys_id.toString();
		scTask.insert();
		gs.log(scTask.number);
    },
	
	checkSoftwaretask: function() {
		var booReturn = false;
		var scCheck = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
		scCheck.addEncodedQuery('active=true^parent=' + current.sys_id);
		scCheck.query();
		if(scCheck.getRowCount() == 0)
			booReturn = true;
		gs.log(scCheck.getRowCount());
			 return booReturn;
		
    },
	

    type: 'TrimedxOnboarding'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-04 18:38:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>93ab370213368b00d80074c66144b033</sys_id><sys_mod_count>59</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TrimedxOnboarding</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_93ab370213368b00d80074c66144b033</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 17:57:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:161221f7131a8700cb92b7a66144b0d7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Auto_Populate_Location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (oldValue!=newValue) {
		var caller = g_form.getReference('OB_UI_PWL',doCustNumber);
	}
	function doCustNumber(caller)
	{
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_state', caller.u_state);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Address',caller.u_address2);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Zip', caller.u_zip);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_City',caller.u_city);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Phone', caller.u_phone1);
		
	}
	if (newValue == '')
		{
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_state', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Address','');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Zip', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_City','');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Phone', '');
		
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-08 14:56:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>388f239313be4f00cb92b7a66144b069</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto_Populate_Location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_388f239313be4f00cb92b7a66144b069</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 15:23:40</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="User Onboarding Information">ff1ad933131a8700cb92b7a66144b0db</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	if(newValue == 'Yes')
		{
			
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PWL', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_state', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Address','');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Zip', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_City','');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_Phone', '');
			
		}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1e28d12613b6cb00cb92b7a66144b033
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TrimedxOnboardingClient</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TrimedxOnboardingClient</name><script><![CDATA[var TrimedxOnboardingClient = Class.create();
TrimedxOnboardingClient.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getUser: function() {
		var objReturn = {};
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_id'));
		objReturn.fName = gr.first_name.toString();
		objReturn.lName = gr.last_name.toString();
		objReturn.perferredName = gr.u_preferred_name.toString();
		objReturn.location = gr.location.getDisplayValue().toString();
		objReturn.title = gr.title.toString();
		objReturn.department = gr.department.getDisplayValue().toString();
        objReturn.manager = gr.manager.toString();
		return new JSON().encode(objReturn);
	},
    type: 'TrimedxOnboardingClient'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-05 19:57:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1e28d12613b6cb00cb92b7a66144b033</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TrimedxOnboardingClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e28d12613b6cb00cb92b7a66144b033</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rwKeller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 22:01:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="New Hire Onboarding Form">a98a013713d68700cb92b7a66144b015</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f5d2382a1336cb00cb92b7a66144b06f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>UserAutoPopulate_onChange</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (oldValue != newValue) {
      globalAutopopulate();
   }
	function globalAutopopulate() {

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var ga = new GlideAjax('TrimedxOnboardingClient');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getUser');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_id',g_form.getValue('OB_UI_requested_for'));
	ga.getXMLAnswer(function(answer) {
		myObj = JSON.parse(answer);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_FN', myObj.fName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_LN', myObj.lName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PN', myObj.perferredName);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PWLA', myObj.location);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_TE', myObj.title);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_CC', myObj.department);
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_SR', myObj.manager);
	});
	
}
if(newValue=='')
		{
		   g_form.setValue('OB_UI_FN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_LN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PN', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_PWLA', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_TE', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_CC', '');
		g_form.setValue('OB_UI_SR', '');
		}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-05 22:08:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2d56b9ae13f6cb00cb92b7a66144b02c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserAutoPopulate_onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2d56b9ae13f6cb00cb92b7a66144b02c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 01:08:26</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
if(newValue == 'Central Office')
{
	g_form.setVisible("OB_SD_FN", false);  
	g_form.setVisible("OB_SD_ShipLoc", false);  
}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-08 17:18:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7acfccef13fe4f00cb92b7a66144b0b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If delievery loc changes hide </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7acfccef13fe4f00cb92b7a66144b0b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 17:31:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1b0704a1136ec300cb92b7a66144b06b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="New Hire Onboarding Form">a98a013713d68700cb92b7a66144b015</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:ed091dff13d68700cb92b7a66144b084</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>If Primary location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (oldValue!=newValue) {
		var loc = g_form.getValue('OB_SD_ED');
		if(loc == 'Primary Facility')
			{
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SC', g_form.getValue('OB_UI_City'));
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SS', g_form.getValue('OB_UI_state'));
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SZ',g_form.getValue('OB_UI_Zip') );
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_PN', g_form.getValue('OB_UI_Phone'));
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_FN',g_form.getValue('OB_UI_PWL') );
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SA',g_form.getValue('OB_UI_Address'));
			
		}
		else if(loc == 'Ship to another location' || loc == 'Central Office')
			{
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SC', '');
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SS','');
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SZ','' );
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_PN', '');
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_FN','' );
			g_form.setValue('OB_SD_SA','');
			
		}
		
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-20 01:18:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1b0704a1136ec300cb92b7a66144b06b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If Primary location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1b0704a1136ec300cb92b7a66144b06b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-08 16:09:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
